    Chart Config

    2018-06-04

    library(rcw)
library(jsonlite)

## specify JSON template
jsonfile <- system.file("templates/default.json", package = "rcw")
## jsonfile <- "../inst/templates/default.json"

    Single Config

    Create single chart from SDMX query

    query <- "KEI/PRINTO01+PRMNTO01.AUS+AUT+BEL+CAN+CHL+CZE+DNK+EST+FIN+FRA.GP.A/all?startTime=2015&endTime=2015"

chartconfig <- create_config(
  sdmx_data_query = query,
  title = "Key Short-Term Economic Indicators",
  subtitle = c("Measure: Growth previous period",
               "Frequency: Annual",
               "Time: 2015"),
  unit = "Percentage",
  source_url = "http://stats.oecd.org:80/Index.aspx?DataSetCode=KEI",
  source_label = "Key Short-Term Economic Indicators",
  logo = TRUE,
  owner = TRUE,
  type = "BarChart", # "RowChart"
  width = 800,
  height = 500,
  path = jsonfile
)

str(chartconfig)
    ## List of 3
##  $ data :List of 3
##   ..$ data   :List of 7
##   .. ..$ title    : chr "Key Short-Term Economic Indicators"
##   .. ..$ subtitle : chr [1:3] "Measure: Growth previous period" "Frequency: Annual" "Time: 2015"
##   .. ..$ uprs     : chr "Percentage"
##   .. ..$ footnotes:List of 2
##   .. .. ..$ source     : chr "http://stats.oecd.org:80/Index.aspx?DataSetCode=KEI"
##   .. .. ..$ sourceLabel: chr "Key Short-Term Economic Indicators"
##   .. ..$ frequency: NULL
##   .. ..$ series   : list()
##   .. ..$ share    :List of 5
##   .. .. ..$ focused       : Named list()
##   .. .. ..$ chartDimension: NULL
##   .. .. ..$ source        : chr "http://stats.oecd.org:80/SDMX-JSON/data/KEI/PRINTO01+PRMNTO01.AUS+AUT+BEL+CAN+CHL+CZE+DNK+EST+FIN+FRA.GP.A/all?"| __truncated__
##   .. .. ..$ sharedate     : num 1.53e+12
##   .. .. ..$ dependencies  :List of 1
##   .. .. .. ..$ oecd-configurable-charts: chr "4.1.1"

##   .. ..$ base :List of 2
##   .. .. ..$ width : num 800
##   .. .. ..$ height: num 500
##   .. ..$ axis :List of 2
##   .. .. ..$ x:List of 1
##   .. .. .. ..$ linear:List of 1
##   .. .. .. .. ..$ pivot: Named list()
##   .. .. ..$ y:List of 1
##   .. .. .. ..$ linear:List of 1
##   .. .. .. .. ..$ pivot: Named list()
##   .. ..$ map  :List of 2
##   .. .. ..$ projection: NULL
##   .. .. ..$ scale     : NULL
##   .. ..$ serie:List of 1
##   .. .. ..$ choropleth: Named list()
##   ..$ config :List of 3
##   .. ..$ logo : chr "data:image/svg+xml;base64,PHN2ZyBpZD0iQ2FscXVlXzEiIGRhdGEtbmFtZT0iQ2FscXVlIDEiIHhtbG5zPSJodHRwOi8vd3d3LnczLm9yZ"| __truncated__
##   .. ..$ owner: chr "©OECD"
##   .. ..$ terms:List of 2
##   .. .. ..$ label: chr "Terms & Conditions"
##   .. .. ..$ link : chr "https://www.oecd.org/termsandconditions/"
##  $ share: chr "latest"
##  $ type : chr "BarChart"
    chart_url <-
  post_config(
    config = chartconfig,
    url = "http://stats.oecd.org",      # this is the default value
    response = TRUE #,
    ## httr::verbose()                     # do not use if logo=TRUE in chart config
  )
    ## Response [http://stats.oecd.org/share]
##   Date: 2018-06-04 20:52
##   Status: 201
##   Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
##   Size: 14 B
    # browseURL(url = chart_url)              # open URL in browser

    See result at http://stats.oecd.org/chart?id=4cis

    Multi Config

    Create one chart per variable

    var_ls <- list(
  list(code = "PRINTO01", label = "Industrial Production"),
  list(code = "PRMNTO01", label = "Total Manufacturing")
)

cou_c <- c("AUS", "AUT", "BEL", "CAN", "CHL", "CZE", "DNK", "EST", "FIN", "FRA")
cou_str <- paste(cou_c, collapse = "+")

subtitle <- c("Measure: Growth previous period", "Frequency: Annual", "Time: 2015")

query_url_ls <- lapply(var_ls, function(x) {
  query1 <- paste(x$code, cou_str, "GP", "A", sep = ".")
  query2 <- file.path("KEI", query1, "all?startTime=2015&endTime=2015")
  config <- create_config(sdmx_data_query = query2,
                          title = "Key Short-Term Economic Indicators",
                          subtitle = c(x$label, subtitle),
                          type = "BarChart",
                          path = jsonfile)
  list(
    code = x$code,
    label = x$label,
    config = config
  )
})

str(query_url_ls)
    ## List of 2
##  $ :List of 3
##   ..$ code  : chr "PRINTO01"
##   ..$ label : chr "Industrial Production"
##   ..$ config:List of 3
##   .. ..$ data :List of 3
##   .. .. ..$ data   :List of 7
##   .. .. .. ..$ title    : chr "Key Short-Term Economic Indicators"
##   .. .. .. ..$ subtitle : chr [1:4] "Industrial Production" "Measure: Growth previous period" "Frequency: Annual" "Time: 2015"
##   .. .. .. ..$ uprs     : NULL
##   .. .. .. ..$ footnotes: Named list()

##   .. .. .. .. ..$ link : chr "https://www.oecd.org/termsandconditions/"
##   .. ..$ share: chr "latest"
##   .. ..$ type : chr "BarChart"
    chart_url_c <-
  sapply(query_url_ls,
         function(x) post_config(config = x$config,
                                 url = "http://stats.oecd.org"))

print(chart_url_c)
    ## [1] "http://stats.oecd.org/chart?id=4cit"
## [2] "http://stats.oecd.org/chart?id=4ciu"
